channel.title: CVE Feed for soumettre -- Soumettre.fr
channel.description: The latest CVEs for soumettre -- Soumettre.fr

item.title: CVE-2024-8675|2024-10-01T15:36:09.643Z -- soumettre -- soumettre.fr
item.description: The Soumettre.fr plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the soumettre_disconnect_gateway function in all versions up to, and including, 2.1.2. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Subscriber-level access and above, to disconnect the gateway and delete the API key.

item.title: CVE-2024-8675|2024-10-01T07:30:14.837Z -- soumettre -- soumettre.fr
item.description: The Soumettre.fr plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the soumettre_disconnect_gateway function in all versions up to, and including, 2.1.2. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Subscriber-level access and above, to disconnect the gateway and delete the API key.
